Torrent max time out (in seconds) for co:
Max timeout (in seconds) for connecting to peers before the download restarts.
Less than 5 seconds makes it turn off.
If torrent may seem stuck on connecting:
If the torrent seems stuck on connecting to peers, it will automatically restart after %d seconds.
You can change this time in the max timeout settings, or just manually restart it.
